column4: jrib:, I hate all Ubuntu versions before and after 10.04, I have only ever felt 'at home' with 10.04.
10.04 sucks so bad, BUT, the 10.04.4 has A LOT of bug fixes, and it's beautiful!
I'm not going anywhere away from 10.04 EVER, it's like Windows users who see Vista and wanna stay with XP, there are reasons.
<OT> fyi, debian stable "squeeze" is what 10.04 was based off of, and still has more then a year of support for sure.  zombie-supported gnome2 ;)
